Queen of the Jungle series is an upcoming American drama television series created by Michal Zebede and Michael London for AMC.
Plot
The estranged granddaughter of the Cortez family, which has the largest eco-luxury hotel real estate empire in Costa Rica. When her grandfather dies, she pulls the thread that unravels her family’s dark past, as descendants and rivals fight to the death for control of the lucrative Cortez empire.
Production
Development
On November 8, 2022, AMC was set to produce the family drama television series “Queen of the Jungle” with Michal Zebede and Michael London writing, showrunning, and executive producing the series through London’s Groundswell Productions company.
